title: Opinion: The Realism We Are Missing In Modi's Ukraine Trip
content: By maintaining its stance of strategic neutrality, India is securing self-interest-driven allies in Europe and Asia without the overlordship of the US.
summary: By maintaining its stance of strategic neutrality, India is securing self-interest-driven allies in Europe and Asia without the overlordship of the US.

title: Donald Trump Scrambles For Media Spotlight As Kamala Harris Leads
content: Donald Trump, touting plans on taxes and health, tried on Friday to turn the page on a week in which he was overshadowed by Kamala Harris and struggled to focus on policy issues instead of personal attacks on his opponent in the US presidential race.
summary: Donald Trump, touting plans on taxes and health, tried on Friday to turn the page on a week in which he was overshadowed by Kamala Harris and struggled to focus on policy issues instead of personal attacks on his opponent in the US presidential race.

title: Bangladesh's Worst Floods Leave 5 Million Stranded Amid Political Turmoil
content: About five million people in Bangladesh were stranded by floods in low-lying areas, as strong currents washed away river embankments.
summary: About five million people in Bangladesh were stranded by floods in low-lying areas, as strong currents washed away river embankments.

title: "Not For The Faint Of Heart": Senior Tesla Exec Quits After 11 Years
content: Tesla vice president Sreela Venkataratnam, who appears to have worked at the automaker since 2013, has quit.
summary: Tesla vice president Sreela Venkataratnam, who appears to have worked at the automaker since 2013, has quit.

title: US Approves Sale Of $52 Million Anti-Submarine Warfare Sonobuoys To India
content: The United States Secretary of State, Antony Blinken, has approved a possible foreign military sale of anti-submarine warfare Sonobuoys and related equipment to India at an estimated cost of USD 52.8 million.
summary: The United States Secretary of State, Antony Blinken, has approved a possible foreign military sale of anti-submarine warfare Sonobuoys and related equipment to India at an estimated cost of USD 52.8 million.

title: Kamala Harris Gears Up For Polls, Mallika Sherawat's 2009 Prediction Viral
content: Actor Mallika Sherawat applauded US Vice President Kamala Harris on her 'self-made' political career after she was named as the Democratic Party's official candidate for the US Presidential elections.
summary: Actor Mallika Sherawat applauded US Vice President Kamala Harris on her 'self-made' political career after she was named as the Democratic Party's official candidate for the US Presidential elections.

title: "Crossed Line": Canada Bank On Why It Fired Employees Over Relationship
content: Royal Bank of Canada said an employee it fired over an intimate relationship with its former chief financial officer was focused on leveraging that alleged romance for his own personal advancement within the firm.
summary: Royal Bank of Canada said an employee it fired over an intimate relationship with its former chief financial officer was focused on leveraging that alleged romance for his own personal advancement within the firm.

title: Japan TV Anchor Fired Over Social Media Post Criticising Men's Body Odour
content: A Tokyo-based television news anchor was fired from her job and faced online backlash after a controversial post on social media in which she criticised men's hygiene habits.
summary: A Tokyo-based television news anchor was fired from her job and faced online backlash after a controversial post on social media in which she criticised men's hygiene habits.

title: South Asian And Proud: How Kamala Harris Is Winning Over Indian-Americans
content: In her acceptance speech for the Democratic nomination, Kamala Harris vowed to resist the influence of authoritarian leaders, who she implied have allegedly manipulated Donald Trump's foreign policy by appealing to his autocratic tendencies.
summary: In her acceptance speech for the Democratic nomination, Kamala Harris vowed to resist the influence of authoritarian leaders, who she implied have allegedly manipulated Donald Trump's foreign policy by appealing to his autocratic tendencies.

title: Bangladeshi Soldiers Detain Ex-Supreme Court Judge Near Border With India
content: A retired judge of Bangladesh's Supreme Court was detained from the northeastern frontier with India in Sylhet while he was allegedly attempting to flee the country, the Border Guard Bangladesh (BGB) said late on Friday.
summary: A retired judge of Bangladesh's Supreme Court was detained from the northeastern frontier with India in Sylhet while he was allegedly attempting to flee the country, the Border Guard Bangladesh (BGB) said late on Friday.

title: Female Intern In Vietnam Resigns After Kiss Threat From Male Colleague
content: A female intern in Vietnam recently resigned from her job after an older male colleague allegedly threatened to kiss her at a company team-building event.
summary: A female intern in Vietnam recently resigned from her job after an older male colleague allegedly threatened to kiss her at a company team-building event.

title: ISIS, Elite Snipers, 8 Kills: How Deadly Russian Prison Standoff Unfolded
content: Four jail staffers were killed after a group of prisoners staged a violent revolt at the high-security IK-19 Surovikino penal colony in Russia's Volgograd region on Friday.
summary: Four jail staffers were killed after a group of prisoners staged a violent revolt at the high-security IK-19 Surovikino penal colony in Russia's Volgograd region on Friday.

title: Biden Talks With Zelensky, Announces New Military Aid For Ukraine
content: US President Joe Biden spoke with his Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelensky on Friday and announced a new round of military aid for Kyiv that the Pentagon valued at $125 million.
summary: US President Joe Biden spoke with his Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelensky on Friday and announced a new round of military aid for Kyiv that the Pentagon valued at $125 million.

title: US Military Says It Killed Leader Of Al Qaeda-Aligned Group In Syria
content: The U.S. military said it carried out a strike in Syria on Friday that killed a senior leader of an Al Qaeda aligned group.
summary: The U.S. military said it carried out a strike in Syria on Friday that killed a senior leader of an Al Qaeda aligned group.

title: 3 People Dead In Stabbing Incident In Western Germany: Report
content: Several individuals were killed on Friday night when a man stabbed passers-by at random with a knife at a city festival in the western German city of Solingen, newspaper Bild reported.
summary: Several individuals were killed on Friday night when a man stabbed passers-by at random with a knife at a city festival in the western German city of Solingen, newspaper Bild reported.

title: Zelensky Says "PM Modi Wants Peace More Than Putin"
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Friday said he looks forward to visiting India as it can be a "key" in the global diplomatic efforts to end the war between his country and Russia.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Friday said he looks forward to visiting India as it can be a "key" in the global diplomatic efforts to end the war between his country and Russia.

title: Robert Kennedy Jr Suspends US Presidential Campaign, Endorses Trump
content: Independent presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. said on Friday he would suspend his campaign, and endorsed Republican Donald Trump.
summary: Independent presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. said on Friday he would suspend his campaign, and endorsed Republican Donald Trump.

title: A List Of Countries With Confirmed Cases Of New Mpox Variant
content: The World Health Organization declared mpox a global public health emergency for the second time in two years, following an outbreak of the viral infection in the Democratic Republic of Congo that has spread to neighbouring countries.
summary: The World Health Organization declared mpox a global public health emergency for the second time in two years, following an outbreak of the viral infection in the Democratic Republic of Congo that has spread to neighbouring countries.

title: China's Rocket Debris May Stay In Orbit For Decades, Experts Warn
content: Despite China's assurances on debris mitigation, experts worry about the growing risk from such incidents, emphasizing the need for better international regulation.
summary: Despite China's assurances on debris mitigation, experts worry about the growing risk from such incidents, emphasizing the need for better international regulation.

title: Biden Asked Netanyahu To Pull Israeli Troops From Egypt-Gaza Border: Report
content: U.S. President Joe Biden asked Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to move Israeli troops back from Gaza's border with Egypt as part of an initial phase of a ceasefire deal so that talks could continue, Axios reported on Friday.
summary: U.S. President Joe Biden asked Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to move Israeli troops back from Gaza's border with Egypt as part of an initial phase of a ceasefire deal so that talks could continue, Axios reported on Friday.
